Articles.Content:
Dear KSP developers,

I hope you'll reply to this thread with your thoughts or at least consider the issue at hand.

Currently KSP2 is at 950 turkish liras (local currenty) which equals to 50 USD on Steam.

Currently, Turkey's minimum wage is 10.000 Turkish Liras, so this game is 10% of the minimum wage.

The most expensive game titles in Turkey are the FIFA franchise. Currently the FIFA23 price on steam is 650 Turkish Liras.

The current price tag seems so weirdly high (at least for Turkish citizens). It saddens me that as a very long time KSP fan, I will not be able to obtain and play this wonderful game I've been so hyped about. 

 

Thank you for consideration and I hope you'll integrate a proper regional pricing for Turkish players on steam. 

 

Hope to see you ingame soon!
